languages.text: Каждый подневольный мир — сокровище и источник богатств. Но, управляя ими с умом, претворяя в жизнь новые проекты развития, от каждой планеты можно добиться еще больших результатов.
Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.
languages.original_text: Каждый подневольный мир — сокровище и источник богатств. Но, управляя ими с умом, претворяя в жизнь новые проекты развития, от каждой планеты можно добиться еще больших результатов.

traits.locale_text: Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.
Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.
Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.
Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.
Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.

languages.text: 王朝麾下的每个世界都是宝藏与财富的来源。不过，如果可以审慎地管理这些世界，完成新的开发项目，便可以从这些世界中开采出更多财富。
languages.original_text: Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.

traits.locale_text: 王朝麾下的每个世界都是宝藏与财富的来源。不过，如果可以审慎地管理这些世界，完成新的开发项目，便可以从这些世界中开采出更多财富。

languages.text: すべての従属惑星は宝物であり、同時に富の源である。しかしこれらの惑星を慎重に管理し、新たな開発プロジェクトに着手することで、さらに大きな成果が得られる。
languages.original_text: Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.

traits.locale_text: すべての従属惑星は宝物であり、同時に富の源である。しかしこれらの惑星を慎重に管理し、新たな開発プロジェクトに着手することで、さらに大きな成果が得られる。

languages.text: Todos los mundos vasallos son un tesoro y una fuente de riqueza. Aun así, con una gestión prudente y nuevos proyectos de desarrollo, es posible mejorar sus resultados.
languages.original_text: Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.

traits.locale_text: Todos los mundos vasallos son un tesoro y una fuente de riqueza. Aun así, con una gestión prudente y nuevos proyectos de desarrollo, es posible mejorar sus resultados.

languages.text: Jede Vasallenwelt ist eine Quelle des Wohlstandes. Die besonnene Verwaltung dieser Welten und die Umsetzung neuer Entwicklungsprojekte kann aber noch bessere Resultate nach sich ziehen.
languages.original_text: Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.

traits.locale_text: Jede Vasallenwelt ist eine Quelle des Wohlstandes. Die besonnene Verwaltung dieser Welten und die Umsetzung neuer Entwicklungsprojekte kann aber noch bessere Resultate nach sich ziehen.

languages.text: Tout monde vassal est un trésor et une source de richesses. Cependant, en gérant ces mondes avec sagesse et en menant de nouveaux projets de développement, il est possible d'obtenir des résultats encore plus aboutis.
languages.original_text: Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.

traits.locale_text: Tout monde vassal est un trésor et une source de richesses. Cependant, en gérant ces mondes avec sagesse et en menant de nouveaux projets de développement, il est possible d'obtenir des résultats encore plus aboutis.

languages.text: Her bir vasal dünya, bir hazine ve bir zenginlik kaynağıdır. Bu dünyalar sağduyulu bir şekilde yönetildiğinde ve yeni kalkınma projelerine önayak olunduğunda çok daha muazzam sonuçlar elde edilebilir.
languages.original_text: Every vassal world is a treasure and a source of wealth. However, by managing these worlds with prudence and undertaking new development projects, one can make them deliver even greater results.

traits.locale_text: Her bir vasal dünya bir hazine ve bir zenginlik kaynağıdır ancak bu dünyalar sağduyulu bir şekilde yönetildiğinde ve yeni kalkınma projelerine önayak olunduğunda daha bile muazzam sonuçlar elde edilebilir.
